channel.title: Posts on Selina Space
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Selina Space

item.title: The Plan For The Next Few Months
item.description: Miscellaneous talk Starting from today, I need to be ready for an interview anytime. However, the laboratory tasks are arduous, plus the need to write an opening report, plans and goals can only be delayed again and again. So I feel that I wrote this article in order to urge myself to complete the task of rewriting questions every day.

item.title: Original Intention Of Blogging
item.description: Write at the beginning For a long time, I felt that I should write something, not only as a technician, but also as a living person. In modern society, most people do not have a place where they can vent their feelings freely, and so do authors. Therefore, my original intention to write a blog is largely because I have a pure land where I can vent freely on the Internet.
